section.title: Likes and dislikes
section.sectiontitle: Use the following phrases to talk about likes and dislikes:
section.text1: absolutely love (+++), really like (++), quite like (+), be quite keen on (+), don't mind (+-)
section.text2: be not very keen on (-), don't like (-), really hate (--), can't stand (---)
section.text2a: I'm not very keen on getting up early.
section.sectiontitle2: After each phrase, use a gerund (e.g. doing) or a noun (e.g. chocolate).
